tool_description: Generates rebalancing signals by comparing current and target allocations, considering tolerance bands and constraints.
error_messages: Weight array mismatch: current_weights and target_weights must have the same length.
Invalid weights: All weights must be non-negative and sum to approximately 1.0.
Invalid threshold: tolerance_threshold must be between 0 and 10.
Invalid minimum trade: minimum_trade_value must be positive.
usage: Provide current_weights and target_weights arrays. Adjust tolerance_threshold and minimum_trade_value to control rebalancing sensitivity.

weight_deviations.description: Deviation of current from target weights
